urls.title: Hydrometry: River Discharge Monitoring using ADCPs
urls.description: Acoustic Doppler Current Profilers (ADCPs) offer a well-proven and highly effective method for River Discharge Monitoring. ADCPs can help you to obtain accurate discharge measurements in a variety of sites ranging from small streams to the largest of rivers. Feedback for a bespoke course for the Office for Public Works in May 2021 was 99% positive! Location and Date: Online! (a classroom-based  course with a fieldwork element may be on offer from spring 2022) 21- 24 September 2021 - 4 half days ( 9:30 – 1 pm) Please book online here now (credit and debit cards accepted)   DO NOT EDIT THIS SUMMARY! GO TO THE WYSIWYG widget below to edit the page! Cost: Students: £449 Professionals £499 Booking closes on 17 September 2021. Short Course Description: This very practical training workshop is for new starters and moderately experienced ADCP users alike. We will provide a live interactive learning experience via Zoom with virtual breakout rooms. We will also provide recorded videos demonstrat

urls.title: Kendal Flood Risk Management Scheme | The Flood Hub
urls.description: The Environment Agency is delivering a proposed Flood Risk Management Scheme to better protect homes and business from flooding in the Kent catchment, and improve the local environment and community amenities. Kendal is the first area to be delivered, followed by Burneside, Staveley, and Ings, and upstream measures including flood storage. In addition, Natural Flood Management measures are being integrated into the plans which aim to slow the flow of water and provide wider environmental benefits across

urls.title: Protect our world - Environment Agency
urls.description: Join us and build a career that matters.  Protect people, natural spaces, wildlife and our shared future. Safeguard what matters most from the devastating impact of floods. You can be part of an ambitious and innovative £5.2billion capital investment programme to reduce flood risk using both built and more natural flood defences.  Find out how […]
